title: Astrophile
overview: Kimhanmeets his college senior Nubdao again unexpectedly, but he's the only one who can remember their history. Their new relationship develops later when he starts buying every product from a home shopping show she hosts and pretends to constantly find issues with those products to get close to her. Kimhanlives the other side of his life as an artist. Afraid to reveal himself, he goes by the name Klang Mesa (Midsummer). Pete takes advantage by posing as Klang Mesa. Nubdao's best friend Nammon Â is a big fan of Klang Mesa. When Nammondiscovers that Peteis Klang Mesa, she falls in love with him without having any idea that he is a fake.Soon after, Min-jun, host and owner of the show Nubdao hosts, orders her character to be more bold, sassy, and sexy. Although this doesn't please Tankoon, the show's producer and Nubdao's close friend, no one cango against Min-jun's wishes. All Tankoon can do is look after and support Nubdao from afar. Meanwhile, Kimhanalso wants to cheer Nubdaoup. He disguises himself as "loong nhuad", a mystery guy who gives her advice and keeps her company via text messages. How will their relationships unfold? Stay tuned to find out!
